reviews.review_msg: The assignments are really easy and Andreas is really helpful you can ask him for advice or help anytime.
I would say this course is a gpa booster, but the mid term and finals are pretty difficult

Andreas is a fantastic lecturer. His class is quite chill and exciting. I got to use some helpful software and enjoyed working on sound journals. The final assignment is the most exciting ever, trust me. I highly recommend his class.

Imma be real, this course is a free credit. All the quizzes are open book, and 100% of the difficulty is in the projects. Each in-person lecture has fewer people which is kind of sad (For me, the last had like 5 people). People are not going to pass this course learning anything.

I loved seeing stuff I recognized being featured in the lecture
Hes very kind but his presentations are quite along and his classes can get boring after some time. But hes very organised and super kind!

He's very supportive prof in term of assignments and extremely easy-going, probably the best prof at SFU I've ever taken so far. Don't know about in-person class, but that what's I feel about his online class.
